item.title: 42 - Trapping Rain Water
item.description: leetcode Problem Given n non-negative integers representing an elevation map where the width of each bar is 1, compute how much water it can trap after raining. Input: height = [0,1,0,2,1,0,1,3,2,1,2,1] Output: 6 Explanation: The above elevation map (black section) is represented by array [0,1,0,2,1,0,1,3,2,1,2,1]. In this case, 6 units of rain water (blue section) are being trapped. Solution class Solution: def trap(self, height: List[int]) -> int: ans = 0 leftHeight = self.
